name: Facebook URL Identifier
special_instructions: Facebook URL Identifier requires at least one Facebook URL to be provided. If it is not provided, return can_fulfill false and explain accordingly
Facebook URL Identifier can handle multiple URLs at once, just provide them as an array
Facebook URL Identifier returns the internal Facebook ID and metadata if available
Facebook URL Identifier supports pages, posts, profiles and groups
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
